radiographic_examinations.findings: Multiple hypodense lesions throughout the liver, with the largest in the right hepatic lobe measuring 2.1 cm x 2.7 cm likely secondary to biliary hamartomas. A large abscess in the deep right pelvis measuring 8.9 cm x 8.1 cm by 8.9 cm, with air-fluid levels, replacing the appendix. Mild thickening of the ascending colon consistent with colitis. No significant abnormalities in other abdominal and pelvic structures.
